name: cloudwatch-alarms-slack
description: An Amazon Lambda that receives alarm notifications from CloudWatch and posts to Slack.

scripts.deploy: zip -r build.zip . && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name cloudwatch-alarms-slack-staging --region eu-west-1 --zip-file fileb://build.zip && rm build.zip
scripts.deploy-production: zip -r build.zip . && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name cloudwatch-alarms-slack-production --region eu-west-1 --zip-file fileb://build.zip && rm build.zip

author: conde-nast-international
